title: Is it important that we have to make our own song for auditions in K-pop or can we sing other groups’ songs? - Quora

response.answer_text: No it's not important but if u can then that's great but I would still recommend to not to sing ur own song as it would be a little unprofessional as long as ur not a professional lyricist… All the best 👍🌈☺️
No, its not important to make our own song for auditions you can sing other groups song also .
